pkgmetadata.longdescription: Validation of Local and Remote Data Tables // Validate data in data frames, 'tibble' objects, in 'CSV' and 'TSV' files, and in database tables ('PostgreSQL' and 'MySQL'). Validation pipelines can be made using easily-readable, consecutive validation steps and such pipelines allow for switching of the data table context. Upon execution of the validation plan, several reporting options are available. User-defined thresholds for failure rates allow for the determination of appropriate reporting actions.
